40namespace rtc {
41
42SocketAddress::SocketAddress() {
43 Clear();
44}
45
46SocketAddress::SocketAddress(const std::string& hostname, int port) {
47 SetIP(hostname);
48 SetPort(port);
49}
50
51SocketAddress::SocketAddress(uint32_t ip_as_host_order_integer, int port) {
52 SetIP(IPAddress(ip_as_host_order_integer));
53 SetPort(port);
54}
55
56SocketAddress::SocketAddress(const IPAddress& ip, int port) {
57 SetIP(ip);
58 SetPort(port);
59}
60
61SocketAddress::SocketAddress(const SocketAddress& addr) {
62 this->operator=(addr);
63}
64
65void SocketAddress::Clear() {
66 hostname_.clear();
67 literal_ = false;
68 ip_ = IPAddress();
69 port_ = 0;
70 scope_id_ = 0;
71}
72
73bool SocketAddress::IsNil() const {
74 return hostname_.empty() && IPIsUnspec(ip_) && 0 == port_;
75}
76
77bool SocketAddress::IsComplete() const {
78 return (!IPIsAny(ip_)) && (0 != port_);
79}
80
81SocketAddress& SocketAddress::operator=(const SocketAddress& addr) {
82 hostname_ = addr.hostname_;
83 ip_ = addr.ip_;
84 port_ = addr.port_;
85 literal_ = addr.literal_;
86 scope_id_ = addr.scope_id_;
87 return *this;
88}
89
90void SocketAddress::SetIP(uint32_t ip_as_host_order_integer) {
91 hostname_.clear();
92 literal_ = false;
93 ip_ = IPAddress(ip_as_host_order_integer);
94 scope_id_ = 0;
95}
96
97void SocketAddress::SetIP(const IPAddress& ip) {
98 hostname_.clear();
99 literal_ = false;
100 ip_ = ip;
101 scope_id_ = 0;
102}
103
104void SocketAddress::SetIP(const std::string& hostname) {
105 hostname_ = hostname;
106 literal_ = IPFromString(hostname, &ip_);
107 if (!literal_) {
108 ip_ = IPAddress();
109 }
110 scope_id_ = 0;
111}
112
113void SocketAddress::SetResolvedIP(uint32_t ip_as_host_order_integer) {
114 ip_ = IPAddress(ip_as_host_order_integer);
115 scope_id_ = 0;
116}
117
118void SocketAddress::SetResolvedIP(const IPAddress& ip) {
119 ip_ = ip;
120 scope_id_ = 0;
121}
122
123void SocketAddress::SetPort(int port) {
124 port_ = rtc::dchecked_cast<uint16_t>(port);
125}
126
127uint32_t SocketAddress::ip() const {
128 return ip_.v4AddressAsHostOrderInteger();
129}
130
131const IPAddress& SocketAddress::ipaddr() const {
132 return ip_;
133}
134
135uint16_t SocketAddress::port() const {
136 return port_;
137}
138
139std::string SocketAddress::HostAsURIString() const {
140 // If the hostname was a literal IP string, it may need to have square
141 // brackets added (for SocketAddress::ToString()).
142 if (!literal_ && !hostname_.empty())
143 return hostname_;
144 if (ip_.family() == AF_INET6) {
145 return "[" + ip_.ToString() + "]";
146 } else {
147 return ip_.ToString();
148 }
149}
150
151std::string SocketAddress::HostAsSensitiveURIString() const {
152 // If the hostname was a literal IP string, it may need to have square
153 // brackets added (for SocketAddress::ToString()).
154 if (!literal_ && !hostname_.empty())
155 return hostname_;
156 if (ip_.family() == AF_INET6) {
157 return "[" + ip_.ToSensitiveString() + "]";
158 } else {
159 return ip_.ToSensitiveString();
160 }
161}
162
163std::string SocketAddress::PortAsString() const {
164 return std::to_string(port_);
165}
166
167std::string SocketAddress::ToString() const {
168 char buf[1024];
169 rtc::SimpleStringBuilder sb(buf);
170 sb << HostAsURIString() << ":" << port();
171 return sb.str();
172}
173
174std::string SocketAddress::ToSensitiveString() const {
175 char buf[1024];
176 rtc::SimpleStringBuilder sb(buf);
177 sb << HostAsSensitiveURIString() << ":" << port();
178 return sb.str();
179}
180
181std::string SocketAddress::ToResolvedSensitiveString() const {
182 if (IsUnresolvedIP()) {
183 return "";
184 }
185 char buf[1024];
186 rtc::SimpleStringBuilder sb(buf);
187 sb << ipaddr().ToSensitiveString() << ":" << port();
188 return sb.str();
189}
190
191bool SocketAddress::FromString(const std::string& str) {
192 if (str.at(0) == '[') {
193 std::string::size_type closebracket = str.rfind(']');
194 if (closebracket != std::string::npos) {
195 std::string::size_type colon = str.find(':', closebracket);
196 if (colon != std::string::npos && colon > closebracket) {
197 SetPort(strtoul(str.substr(colon + 1).c_str(), nullptr, 10));
198 SetIP(str.substr(1, closebracket - 1));
199 } else {
200 return false;
201 }
202 }
203 } else {
204 std::string::size_type pos = str.find(':');
205 if (std::string::npos == pos)
206 return false;
207 SetPort(strtoul(str.substr(pos + 1).c_str(), nullptr, 10));
208 SetIP(str.substr(0, pos));
209 }
210 return true;
211}
212
213bool SocketAddress::IsAnyIP() const {
214 return IPIsAny(ip_);
215}
216
217bool SocketAddress::IsLoopbackIP() const {
218 return IPIsLoopback(ip_) ||
219 (IPIsAny(ip_) && 0 == strcmp(hostname_.c_str(), "localhost"));
220}
221
222bool SocketAddress::IsPrivateIP() const {
223 return IPIsPrivate(ip_);
224}
225
226bool SocketAddress::IsUnresolvedIP() const {
227 return IPIsUnspec(ip_) && !literal_ && !hostname_.empty();
228}
229
230bool SocketAddress::operator==(const SocketAddress& addr) const {
231 return EqualIPs(addr) && EqualPorts(addr);
232}
233
234bool SocketAddress::operator<(const SocketAddress& addr) const {
235 if (ip_ != addr.ip_)
236 return ip_ < addr.ip_;
237
238 // We only check hostnames if both IPs are ANY or unspecified. This matches
239 // EqualIPs().
240 if ((IPIsAny(ip_) || IPIsUnspec(ip_)) && hostname_ != addr.hostname_)
241 return hostname_ < addr.hostname_;
242
243 return port_ < addr.port_;
244}
245
246bool SocketAddress::EqualIPs(const SocketAddress& addr) const {
247 return (ip_ == addr.ip_) &&
248 ((!IPIsAny(ip_) && !IPIsUnspec(ip_)) || (hostname_ == addr.hostname_));
249}
250
251bool SocketAddress::EqualPorts(const SocketAddress& addr) const {
252 return (port_ == addr.port_);
253}
254
255size_t SocketAddress::Hash() const {
256 size_t h = 0;
257 h ^= HashIP(ip_);
258 h ^= port_ | (port_ << 16);
259 return h;
260}
261
262void SocketAddress::ToSockAddr(sockaddr_in* saddr) const {
263 memset(saddr, 0, sizeof(*saddr));
264 if (ip_.family() != AF_INET) {
265 saddr->sin_family = AF_UNSPEC;
266 return;
267 }
268 saddr->sin_family = AF_INET;
269 saddr->sin_port = HostToNetwork16(port_);
270 if (IPIsAny(ip_)) {
271 saddr->sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
272 } else {
273 saddr->sin_addr = ip_.ipv4_address();
274 }
275}
276
277bool SocketAddress::FromSockAddr(const sockaddr_in& saddr) {
278 if (saddr.sin_family != AF_INET)
279 return false;
280 SetIP(NetworkToHost32(saddr.sin_addr.s_addr));
281 SetPort(NetworkToHost16(saddr.sin_port));
282 literal_ = false;
283 return true;
284}
285
286static size_t ToSockAddrStorageHelper(sockaddr_storage* addr,
287 const IPAddress& ip,
288 uint16_t port,
289 int scope_id) {
290 memset(addr, 0, sizeof(sockaddr_storage));
291 addr->ss_family = static_cast<unsigned short>(ip.family());
292 if (addr->ss_family == AF_INET6) {
293 sockaddr_in6* saddr = reinterpret_cast<sockaddr_in6*>(addr);
294 saddr->sin6_addr = ip.ipv6_address();
295 saddr->sin6_port = HostToNetwork16(port);
296 saddr->sin6_scope_id = scope_id;
297 return sizeof(sockaddr_in6);
298 } else if (addr->ss_family == AF_INET) {
299 sockaddr_in* saddr = reinterpret_cast<sockaddr_in*>(addr);
300 saddr->sin_addr = ip.ipv4_address();
301 saddr->sin_port = HostToNetwork16(port);
302 return sizeof(sockaddr_in);
303 }
304 return 0;
305}
306
307size_t SocketAddress::ToDualStackSockAddrStorage(sockaddr_storage* addr) const {
308 return ToSockAddrStorageHelper(addr, ip_.AsIPv6Address(), port_, scope_id_);
309}
310
311size_t SocketAddress::ToSockAddrStorage(sockaddr_storage* addr) const {
312 return ToSockAddrStorageHelper(addr, ip_, port_, scope_id_);
313}
314
315bool SocketAddressFromSockAddrStorage(const sockaddr_storage& addr,
316 SocketAddress* out) {
317 if (!out) {
318 return false;
319 }
320 if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET) {
321 const sockaddr_in* saddr = reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr_in*>(&addr);
322 *out = SocketAddress(IPAddress(saddr->sin_addr),
323 NetworkToHost16(saddr->sin_port));
324 return true;
325 } else if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET6) {
326 const sockaddr_in6* saddr = reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr_in6*>(&addr);
327 *out = SocketAddress(IPAddress(saddr->sin6_addr),
328 NetworkToHost16(saddr->sin6_port));
329 out->SetScopeID(saddr->sin6_scope_id);
330 return true;
331 }
332 return false;
333}
334
335SocketAddress EmptySocketAddressWithFamily(int family) {
336 if (family == AF_INET) {
337 return SocketAddress(IPAddress(INADDR_ANY), 0);
338 } else if (family == AF_INET6) {
339 return SocketAddress(IPAddress(in6addr_any), 0);
340 }
341 return SocketAddress();
342}

344} // namespace rtc
